title: My grandpa will test your website!
paragraph1: According to the United Nations Demographic Report, in Europe, 25% of the population is already aged 60 years or over. That proportion is projected to reach 35% in 2050 and to remain around that level in the second half of the century.
paragraph2: My grandfather is 75 years old and this year he is breaking into IT industry as a User Experience tester. He was always interested in technology, but to be honest modern interfaces are not always easy for him to navigate. Poor grandpa always feel lost and frustrated. If he could just tell all the website owners, what was the hardest thing on their website to deal with. That would drastically improve user experiense on their website for all.
paragraph3: If you are the website owner or the developer - contact my grandpa via the contact form. He will test your website and send you the video of himself using your website. He will give you an advice how to impove your inteface based on what he is struggling with.
